title: Amazon Files Lawsuits Against Fraudsters Peddling Fake Reviews
description:
By Waqas

According to Amazon, it has already taken significant action against 94 fraudsters operating in the United States, China, and Europe in May 2023.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: Amazon Files Lawsuits Against Fraudsters Peddling Fake Reviews

title: Researchers Use Power LED to Extract Encryption Keys in Groundbreaking Attack
description:
By Deeba Ahmed

This attack method can help attackers surpass all barriers to exploit side channels, which so far were not possible.
